law.catch_line: The incorporators shall sign and acknowledge the articles of incorporation....

text.section: The incorporators shall sign and acknowledge the articles of incorporation.

section.section: The powers set forth in the articles of incorporation may not exceed the powers granted to societies by this subtitle.
The purposes of a society may include any lawful social, intellectual, educational, charitable, benevolent, moral, fraternal, or religious activity.

text.section: The name of a society may not be misleadingly or confusingly similar to the name of any other society or insurer.
